titleStmt.title: The balme of love: to heale divisions, and the wounds made by them, and to make the body of Christ whole and entire for its owne beauty, strength, and safety. Partly presented in a former discourse, when it might have prevented, and now after many evills for want of prevention re-enforced in a second. / By F. Rous, a member of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

titleStmt.title: The balme of love: to heale divisions, and the wounds made by them, and to make the body of Christ whole and entire for its owne beauty, strength, and safety. Partly presented in a former discourse, when it might have prevented, and now after many evills for want of prevention re-enforced in a second. / By F. Rous, a member of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London for John Wright, at the Kings-Head in the Old-Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
